pokedex.name: Caterpie
pokedex.lore: Its coat is bright green to protect it from predators, blending in with its forest surroundings. It can release a powerful stench from its antennae.

pokedex.name: Metapod
pokedex.lore: A hard shell protects its soft body from predators while it prepares for its next evolution. It is incredibly vulnerable to direct attacks.

pokedex.name: Butterfree
pokedex.lore: Butterfree can locate flowers and pollen from great distances. It can flap its wings at high speed to scatter poisonous dust.

pokedex.name: Weedle
pokedex.lore: Weedle has a sharp poison sting on its head. Its bright colors warn predators to stay away.

pokedex.name: Kakuna
pokedex.lore: Kakuna remains dormant while its internal organs are undergoing a dramatic transformation. The poison on its shell is extremely potent.

pokedex.name: Beedrill
pokedex.lore: Beedrill can fly at high speeds and attack with the two large poison stingers on its arms. It is fiercely territorial and will chase intruders away.

pokedex.name: Pidgey
pokedex.lore: Pidgey can create a sandstorm by flapping its wings. It is harmless and often found in forests and plains.

pokedex.name: Pidgeotto
pokedex.lore: Pidgeotto is a very protective Pokémon. It will fiercely defend its territory and will not hesitate to attack anyone who trespasses.

pokedex.name: Pidgeot
pokedex.lore: Pidgeot can fly at Mach 2 speeds. Its feathers are a symbol of beauty and power.

pokedex.name: Rattata
pokedex.lore: Rattata is a very cautious Pokémon. It is known to live in groups and will not hesitate to attack if it feels threatened.

pokedex.name: Raticate
pokedex.lore: Raticate's sharp fangs can gnaw through anything. It is known to be very aggressive and will not hesitate to attack anything it sees as a threat.

pokedex.name: Spearow
pokedex.lore: Spearow's small body makes it easy to maneuver in the air. It can be a very annoying Pokémon, as it is known to steal food from other Pokémon.

pokedex.name: Fearow
pokedex.lore: Fearow can fly at incredible speeds. Its sharp beak is so strong it can pierce a diamond.

pokedex.name: Ekans
pokedex.lore: Ekans is known to coil up and swallow its prey whole. It can also produce a very powerful venom.

pokedex.name: Arbok
pokedex.lore: Arbok's pattern on its hood is said to be different in every region. It will constrict its prey until it is nothing more than a pulp.

pokedex.name: Pikachu
pokedex.lore: When it's in a large group, it can cause a large electric storm. Its thunderbolt is said to be extremely powerful.

pokedex.name: Raichu
pokedex.lore: Raichu can discharge over 100,000 volts of electricity. It will not hesitate to zap anyone who threatens it.

pokedex.name: Sandshrew
pokedex.lore: Sandshrew can curl into a ball to protect itself. It is known to live in deserts and will not hesitate to burrow underground to escape from danger.

pokedex.name: Sandslash
pokedex.lore: Sandslash can roll into a ball and attack its opponents. Its claws are so sharp it can cut through steel.

pokedex.name: Nidoran♀
pokedex.lore: Nidoran♀ is known to be very protective of its young. It will not hesitate to use its poison to protect its family.

pokedex.name: Nidorina
pokedex.lore: Nidorina's horn is incredibly potent. It can release a powerful poison that can paralyze its opponents.

pokedex.name: Nidoqueen
pokedex.lore: Nidoqueen is a very protective and powerful Pokémon. It is a symbol of motherly love and will do anything to protect its young.

pokedex.name: Nidoran♂
pokedex.lore: Nidoran♂ is known to be very aggressive. It is known to use its horn to attack anything it sees as a threat.

pokedex.name: Nidorino
pokedex.lore: Nidorino's horn is so strong it can pierce through rocks. It is known to be very aggressive and will not hesitate to attack anyone who trespasses.

pokedex.name: Nidoking
pokedex.lore: Nidoking is a very powerful and aggressive Pokémon. It is known to use its powerful horn to destroy anything in its path.

pokedex.name: Clefairy
pokedex.lore: Clefairy is a very rare Pokémon. It is said to have a mysterious power, and it can be found in the mountains at night.

pokedex.name: Clefable
pokedex.lore: Clefable can float in the air. It is said to be a very shy Pokémon, and it will not hesitate to use its powers to protect itself.

pokedex.name: Vulpix
pokedex.lore: Vulpix can learn to control fire with its tails. When it is born, it only has one tail, and the more it ages, the more tails it gains.

pokedex.name: Ninetales
pokedex.lore: Ninetales is a beautiful and elegant Pokémon. It is said to have a life span of 1,000 years, and it is known to be very intelligent.

pokedex.name: Jigglypuff
pokedex.lore: Jigglypuff's voice is so soothing that it can put anyone to sleep. It is known to be very playful and will not hesitate to sing to anyone.

pokedex.name: Wigglytuff
pokedex.lore: Wigglytuff's body is very soft and fluffy. It can expand its body to a great size, and it is known to be a very gentle Pokémon.

pokedex.name: Zubat
pokedex.lore: Zubat can emit ultrasonic waves to find its way around. It is a very nocturnal Pokémon and will not hesitate to attack anyone who disturbs its sleep.

pokedex.name: Golbat
pokedex.lore: Golbat can suck the blood of its prey. It is known to be very aggressive and will not hesitate to attack anything it sees as a threat.

pokedex.name: Oddish
pokedex.lore: Oddish is a very nocturnal Pokémon. It is known to walk around at night, and it will bury itself in the ground when the sun rises.

pokedex.name: Gloom
pokedex.lore: Gloom's mouth is always dripping with a foul-smelling liquid. It is known to be a very smelly Pokémon, and it will not hesitate to use its stench to defend itself.

pokedex.name: Vileplume
pokedex.lore: Vileplume's flower is said to be the largest in the world. It can release a powerful stench from its flower, which can cause its opponents to faint.

pokedex.name: Paras
pokedex.lore: Paras has a mushroom on its back that can be used to heal. It is known to be a very timid Pokémon and will not hesitate to run away from danger.

pokedex.name: Parasect
pokedex.lore: Parasect's mushroom has taken over its body. It is known to be a very powerful Pokémon, and it can use its mushroom to heal itself.

pokedex.name: Venonat
pokedex.lore: Venonat's eyes can see through anything. It is a very nocturnal Pokémon and will not hesitate to use its eyes to find its way around.

pokedex.name: Venomoth
pokedex.lore: Venomoth's wings are covered in a powerful poison. It is known to be a very fast Pokémon and will not hesitate to use its poison to attack its opponents.

pokedex.name: Diglett
pokedex.lore: Diglett is known to live underground. It is a very shy Pokémon and will not hesitate to burrow underground to escape from danger.

pokedex.name: Dugtrio
pokedex.lore: Dugtrio is a very powerful Pokémon. It can burrow through the ground at high speeds, and it will not hesitate to use its burrowing to attack its opponents.

pokedex.name: Meowth
pokedex.lore: Meowth loves to collect shiny things. It will not hesitate to steal anything it sees as valuable.

pokedex.name: Persian
pokedex.lore: Persian is a very elegant and graceful Pokémon. It is known to be very proud and will not hesitate to attack anyone who insults it.

pokedex.name: Psyduck
pokedex.lore: Psyduck is constantly plagued by a headache. It will not hesitate to use its powers to attack anyone who makes its headache worse.

pokedex.name: Golduck
pokedex.lore: Golduck can swim at high speeds. It is known to be a very fast swimmer and will not hesitate to use its powers to attack its opponents.

pokedex.name: Mankey
pokedex.lore: Mankey is a very aggressive Pokémon. It will not hesitate to attack anyone who makes it angry.

pokedex.name: Primeape
pokedex.lore: Primeape is a very powerful and aggressive Pokémon. It will not hesitate to attack anyone who it sees as a threat.

pokedex.name: Growlithe
pokedex.lore: Growlithe is a very loyal and brave Pokémon. It will not hesitate to defend its trainer from any threat.

pokedex.name: Arcanine
pokedex.lore: Arcanine is a very powerful and fast Pokémon. It is known to be a very fast runner and will not hesitate to defend its trainer from any threat.

pokedex.name: Poliwag
pokedex.lore: Poliwag can swim at incredible speeds. The swirl on its belly is a symbol of its power.
